name: hoodFanSpeedMode_setValue
description: This function is used to change the hood fan speed mode.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to change the hood fan speed mode.

parameters.name: predefinedHoodFanSpeedMode
parameters.description: The specific mode to set for the hood fan speed.
